articles.title: SpaceX gets FCC approval to launch 7,500 more Starlink satellites
articles.description: The Federal Communications Commission has given SpaceX approval to launch another 7,500 of its second generation Starlink satellites.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: OpenAI is reportedly asking contractors to upload real work from past jobs
articles.description: An intellectual property lawyer says OpenAI is "putting itself at great risk" with this approach.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Indonesia blocks Grok over non-consensual, sexualized deepfakes
articles.description: Indonesian officials said Saturday that they are temporarily blocking access to xAI’s chatbot Grok.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Google moonshot spinout SandboxAQ claims an ex-exec is attempting ‘extortion’
articles.description: A former SandboxAQ executive filed a wrongful termination lawsuit filled with shocking allegations. The company is fighting back, hard.
articles.author: Julie Bort
